Since July of 2001, WSD has participated in a unique Urban Music Grant. On November 7, fifth grade students at Turner Intermediate attended a field trip to the Carnegie Museum of Natural History. This unique event culminated in a concert in the Carnegie Music Hall that gave Wilkinsburg Instrumental Music students the opportunity to play side by side with the River City Brass Band.
